content.rendered:
This service involves adding Google Analytics events to your site and setting up conversion tracking through the Analytics dashboard in order to measure and improve conversions.
3PRIME will:
  • Identify up to 5 trackable events on your website
  • Setup event click tracking via Analytics
  • Create conversion goals based on events
  • Wait 2 weeks and deliver a conversion tracking report based on last 2 weeks
